Articles.Content: Would it be possible to add in a setting where you can adjust a craft's orbital line opacity? I know in my saves once you get a lot of vessels going the lines can get bothersome. You could turn them off but sometimes it's nice to be able to see them without getting in the way.
This is why the craft filters exist.

If you move the cursor up to the top of the screen a little pop down appears with vessel icons.  Just  like in the tracking station, you can select which vessel types are displayed by clicking on them there.
